item.title: UTA London Hires Emily Thorpe-Jones to Lead Corporate and Private Events for Music Division
item.description: UTA’s London office has hired Emily Thorpe-Jones to head up corporate and private events for its music division. Thorpe-Jones will work closely with UTA’s agents, managers and artists to d

item.title: UTA, Michael Kassan Settle Litigation Over Exit
item.description: The agency said it fired Kassan for misuse of company funds, while the executive maintained that he quit the day before and filed an arbitration action.

item.title: UTA, Michael Kassan Settle Litigation Over Exit

item.title: Creator Eric Sedeno Signs With UTA (Exclusive)
item.description: The influencer has parlayed comic TikTok and Instagram videos into a solid online following, brand collaborations and a platform to discuss LGBTQ+ issues.
